subject: Simsonn Customs Clearance Documents
description_text: Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. You may use this invoice for customs clearance. Should any additional taxes apply, we will reimburse you for a portion of them. Please rest assured.

conversations.body_text:
Thank you for your assistance.

On Wed, 27 Aug 2025 at 10:07, support@simsonn.com
Hi Gersham5260,    Please feel free to contact us anytime if you encounter any difficulties.

*Subject:* Clarification on Customs Invoice and Tax Reimbursement

Dear Simsonn Support Team,

Thank you for your message and for providing the invoice for customs
clearance.

I would appreciate it if you could clarify a few points:

   -

   What specific details are included in the invoice to ensure smooth
   customs processing?
   -

   If additional taxes are charged, what portion of those will be
   reimbursed, and what is the process for claiming reimbursement?

I want to make sure everything is in order before presenting the invoice to
customs. Thank you again for your assistance.

Best regards,  Gersham5260

Hello, the invoice contains all the information required for customs clearance. After completing customs clearance, you may send us the invoice, and we will reimburse you for a portion of the expenses, depending on the invoice details.
